alert.note: Alert for Benton; Iowa; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 6:14PM CDT until July 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Benton County in east central Iowa... West central Linn County in east central Iowa... Northeastern Iowa County in east central Iowa... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 614 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Garrison, or 8 miles southwest of Vinton, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cedar Rapids, Vinton, Hiawatha, Robins, Fairfax, Atkins, Walford, Palo, Shellsburg, Newhall, Blairstown, Van Horne, Keystone, Norway, Garrison, Luzerne, Toddville, Middle Amana, Pleasant Creek State Recreation Area and Hoefle-Dulin Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
